While you browse this website, these
companies may use non-personally identifiable information such as click stream
data, browser type, time and date, and data about the subject matter you
interact with, in order to provide you with more interesting ads.

If Playwire publisher advertising services are used, Playwire LLC may collect
and use certain aggregated and anonymized data for advertising purposes.

## Third Party Services

We use Google Analytics on all our pages and Google Adsense on pages that
contain ads.

# Imgflip Privacy Policy

## Images you create

Any content submitted to the Imgflip community may be shown to the public.

When you use our website, we share information that your web browser sends us,
such as your IP address or information about your browser or operating system,
with our partner/service provider, LiveRamp Inc. LiveRamp returns an online
identification code that we may store in our first-party cookie for our use in
online and cross-channel advertising and it may be shared with advertising
companies to enable interest-based and targeted advertising.
